special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Elizar is a 7th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Elizar has the following druid spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, guidance, poison spray, produce flame
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, guidance, poison spray, produce flame

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): animal friendship, faerie fire, healing word, jump, thunderwave
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): animal friendship, faerie fire, healing word, jump, thunderwave

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): flame blade, spike growth
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): flame blade, spike growth

descriptions.raw: 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, stinking cloud
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, stinking cloud

descriptions.raw: 4th level (2 slots): blight, wall of fire
descriptions.hyperlinked: 4th level (2 slots): blight, wall of fire

special_abilities.name: Summon Mephits (Recharges after a Long Rest).
descriptions: By puffing on his pipe, Elizar can use an action to cast conjure minor elementals. If he does so, he summons four smoke mephits.

actions.name: Dagger +1.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
